=== The Report ===
For the time period spanning from June 1st until July 10th.

==== IRCC Meeting, July 3rd 2009 ====
* Agreed to remove the closed channel #kubuntu-kde4 from our wiki channel listing
* Revised our descriptions for our offtopic channels to better reflect their purposes
* Deferred <nowiki>[[https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu-community/+bug/392799|bug 392799]]</nowiki> until our next meeting. There were not enough people who had reported the bug present to make any constructive headway on it.
* Jussi01 to write proposal for +v procedures for #ubuntu-ops and #ubuntu-irc and present at next meeting
